Description: Sherd of pottery closed vessel, seemingly from a heavily carinated shoulder; incised bird, head missing, facing right on the outside, with a trace of further incision to left. Brown-purple Nile silt fabric.
Curator's comments: For another, probably earlier, pot with incised bird, see the miniature transport amphora GR1888,0208.165 (Leclère & Spencer 2014, Tell Dafana Reconsidered, pl.60).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IB.078)
